name: Discouraged-workers
body:
Discouraged Workers Demo-V0.4.X =================== Discouraged Workers is creating by YGGDRASIL STUDIO, a korean indiegame creator. The game is a 4th story of Project DW. Currently supported only Korean. If you Korean, please read THIS DOCUMENT. If you want to download for only your OS, checkout link below that currently V0.4.1 released on Dec 20, 2014. After download, please checkout the latest resource files on GitHUB that maybe 'game/**.rpa'. And here, you can check the ReleaseNote.txt Download for Linux(72MB) Download for Mac(68.8MB) Download for Win(70.1MB) Introduce =================== Discouraged Workers is an episode that takes the korean trend "The end of the end drama". Parable of youth's darkside and Ga-Yeon's gloomy everyday. Description ===================
  • The game is not game, this is an Kinetic Novel.
  • The episode is adult content. Children, Seniors or Pregnants, Feeble-Minded Person are not allowed to play this game.
  • You do not need to intervene in the game. Only Watching, Reading, Listening, Feeling.
  • Discouraged Workers are playing to automatically. You can toggle this function.
Features ===================
  • Meticulous storytelling with gloomy theme.
  • Short but intense 75 minutes.
  • Autoplay speed like a humans speech.
  • Cinematic transition effects.
  • The actual photo retouching background.
  • Over 30+ achievements and rewards -Currently not included.
  • Most powerful compression technology used.
System Requirements (PC) ===================
  • OS : Windows XP / Mac OS X Version Leopard 10.5.8 / Linux x86
  • CPU : Pentium 4 1.66Ghz
  • RAM : 1GB
  • HDD : 128MB -Comprehensive Version
  • DirectX : DirectX 9.0
  • Resolution : HD(1280*720) or higher
  • Graphic Card : DirectX compatible card
  • Sound Card : DirectX compatible card
System Requirements (Mobile) ===================
  • OS : Android 2.2(Froyo) / iOS 5.0(9A334)
  • OpenGL : 2.0 or higher
  • Resolution : WVGA(800*480) or higher
  • SD Card : 68.5MB -Will be compressed into a 3rd again.
  • Currently not distributed.
Distribution Platform -Is Expected ===================
  • Package : 11st, Alibaba, Amazon, Auction, eBay, GMarket, Interpark, KIGS, Naver Shopping, Naver Storefarm
  • PC Platform : Amazon, Mac AppStore, D2D, Desura, Gamers Gate, Game Jolt, GOG.com, Green Man Gaming, Humble, IndieGameStand, INDOMOG, itch.io, Playism, Steam, Windows Store
  • Mobile Platform : Amazon, Alleh Market, Appbrain, AppLiv, AppStore, Facebook Appcenter, GooglePlay, NStore, SlideME, TStore, Windows Store
  • Console Platform : OUYA, PSP, PS Vita
Product Planned -Is Expected ===================
  • Physical - Bromide, Calender, Code Pack, Concept book, Diary, Dakimakura, Game Package, Movie, Music Notebook, Light Novel, Notebook, OST Album, Resource Pack, TCG Pack
  • Digital - Code Pack, Concept book, Game, Movie, Light Novel, Line Sticker, OST Album, Resource Pack
Copyright =================== Discouraged Workers â“’ YGGDRASIL STUDIO All Rights Reserved. All trademarks are property of their respective owners. Do not distribute our program or any alterations of our program files.
